title.en: The Story of Being Unable to Leave the House Because of My Older Sister

altTitles.ja: 姉貴のせいで家を出れない話

altTitles.ja-ro: Aneki no Sei de Ie o Derarenai Hanashi

altTitles.ja: サカモト デイズ

description.en: Taro Sakamoto was the ultimate assassin, feared by villains and admired by hitmen. But one day…he fell in love! Retirement, marriage, fatherhood and then… Sakamoto gained weight! The chubby guy who runs the neighborhood store is actually a former legendary hitman! Can he protect his family from danger? Get ready to experience a new kind of action comedy series!
description.fr:
Taro Sakamoto est un assassin légendaire, le meilleur d'entre tous, craint par tous les gangsters, adulé par ses pairs. Mais un beau jour... il tombe amoureux ! S'ensuivent retraite, mariage, paternité... et prise de poids.
Sakamoto est aujourd'hui patron d'une petite épicerie de quartier et coule des jours heureux avec sa famille. Mais lorsque son passé le rattrape sous les traits de Shin, un jeune assassin télépathe, Sakamoto reprend du service...
Et malgré son apparence, il est toujours aussi charismatique lorsqu'il passe à l'action !
description.ja: 町の商店を営むふくよかな男・坂本太郎。その正体は全ての悪党が恐れ、憧れた元・伝説の殺し屋!!　襲い来る危険から家族と日常を守る、坂本の日々とは…!?
description.ru: Таро Сакамото был профессиональным киллером. Другие наёмники им восхищались, а злодеи боялись. Но однажды… Сакамото влюбился! Завязал с криминалом, женился, стал отцом и в итоге… Разжирел! Толстый дядька из соседнего магазина — в прошлом непревзойдённый убийца! Сможет ли он уберечь свою семью от опасности? Приготовьтесь к новой остросюжетной комедии!
description.pt-br: Taro Sakamoto era o assassino supremo, temido pelos vilões e admirado pelos assassinos. Mas um dia... ele se apaixonou! Aposentadoria, casamento, paternidade e depois… Sakamoto engordou! O cara gordinho que administra a loja do bairro é na verdade um ex-assassino lendário! Ele pode proteger sua família do perigo? Prepare-se para experimentar um novo tipo de série de comédia de ação!

altTitles.ja: ユメかウツツか

description.en: The main character, Iroha, is a first-year high school student who finds it difficult to talk to others. Even though it’s been about two months since she started high school, she still hasn’t had a proper conversation with any of her classmates. During every break, she quietly slips out of the classroom and heads to the courtyard by the old school building. She does this to meet and talk with a senior she met at the town library while studying for exams. This senior, who is a year older, has become a source of support for Iroha. However, the two of them share a secret...
description.es: La protagonista, Iroha, es una estudiante de primer año de instituto a la que le cuesta hablar con los demás. Aunque han pasado dos meses desde que empezó el instituto, todavía no ha tenido una conversación adecuada con ninguno de sus compañeros. En los recreos, se escapa de clase y se dirige al patio, junto al antiguo edificio de la escuela. Lo hace para encontrarse y hablar con un estudiante de último curso que conoció en la biblioteca del pueblo mientras estudiaba para los exámenes. Este alumno, un año mayor que ella, se ha convertido en una fuente de apoyo para Iroha. Sin embargo, ambos comparten un secreto...
description.fr: Iroha, le personnage principal, est un lycéen de première année qui a du mal à parler aux autres. Bien que deux mois se soient écoulés depuis son entrée au lycée, elle n'a encore jamais eu de véritable conversation avec l'un de ses collègues de classe. Durant la récréation, il sort de la classe en cachette et se rend dans la cour de récréation située à côté de l'ancien bâtiment scolaire. Elle le fait pour rencontrer un élève de terminale qu'elle a rencontré à la bibliothèque municipale alors qu'elle étudiait pour ses examens. Cet étudiant, qui a un an de plus qu'elle, est devenu une source de soutien pour Iroha. Cependant, toutes deux partagent un secret...
description.ja: 主人公は他人と会話することが苦手な高校1年生・いろは。高校入学から約2カ月、いまだクラスの人とまともに話せない彼女は、休み時間のたびに教室を抜け出しては旧校舎側の中庭に向かう。その目的とは、受験勉強をしているときに町の図書館で出会った1つ年上の先輩と話すこと。先輩との交流を支えに日々を過ごすいろはだが、2人にはある秘密があって……。
description.es-la: La protagonista, Iroha, es una estudiante de primer año de instituto a la que le cuesta hablar con los demás. Aunque han pasado dos meses desde que empezó el instituto, todavía no ha tenido una conversación adecuada con ninguno de sus compañeros. En los recreos, se escapa de clase y se dirige al patio, junto al antiguo edificio de la escuela. Lo hace para encontrarse y hablar con un estudiante de último curso que conoció en la biblioteca del pueblo mientras estudiaba para los exámenes. Este alumno, un año mayor que ella, se ha convertido en una fuente de apoyo para Iroha. Sin embargo, ambos comparten un secreto...

altTitles.ja: ジェーン

description.en:
A story about a woman in her late 20s to early 30s with a high-flying career dating a university student.

Note: The author also made a [song](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9IF8Mdk64wg) based on the oneshot.

title.en: Saijaku Tamer wa Gomi Hiroi no Tabi o Hajimemashita

altTitles.ja: 最弱テイマーはゴミ拾いの旅を始めました。＠COMIC

altTitles.ja-ro: Saijaku Tamer wa Gomi Hiroi no Tabi wo Hajimemashita

altTitles.en: The Weakest Tamer Began a Journey to Pick up Trash

altTitles.fr: La dresseuse sans étoiles parcourt le monde pour récolter des déchets

altTitles.ru: Слабейшая укротительница в путешествии по сбору мусора

altTitles.th: การผจญภัยของเทมเมอร์มือใหม่ กับสไลม์สุดด๋อย

altTitles.ko: 최약 테이머는 폐지 줍는 여행을 시작했습니다

altTitles.zh: 最弱的驯养师开启的捡垃圾的旅途

altTitles.id: Penjinak terlemah mulai berkelana untuk memungut sampah

altTitles.uk: Найслабша приборкувачка почала свою подорож зі збирання сміття

altTitles.id: Pawang Terlemah Mulai Berpetualang Menjadi Pemulung

description.en:
When Ivy was born into this world, she remembered her past life. Remembering her preincarnation, she strove to avoid strife. But fate curdled at the status check, when kids learn who they are. For she had only one skill – Taming – and not a single star. Ivy was weak from the start – at most, she could tame a slime. And in her world, most people did not give the weak their time. Only one woman in her village would treat her as her own. But after she died, Ivy got the hint and ran from home. While on the lam, she met a tiny slime and made Sora its name.  And such begins the heart-warming survival story of a small girl who can tame.

- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9629ex/)
description.fr:
Dans un monde fantasy où l'avenir de chacun est déterminé par les "skills" révélés durant l'enfance, la jeune Ivy se voit attribuer le métier de dresseuse de monstres au rang le plus bas qui soit : sans-étoile. Rejetée par son village, elle entame alors un voyage aux côtés de Sora, un slime tout faible, seul monstre qu'elle ait réussi à apprivoiser.
La plus faible des dresseuses et le plus faible des monstres parviendront-ils à survivre dans ce monde rude et sans pitié... ?
description.ja: スキル上主義の異世界。気弱で優しい魔物使い《テイマー》に転生した少女・アイビーは星なしの最弱ランクがために命を狙われ、生きるために旅に出る。道中唯一テイムできたのは最弱の崩れスライム「ソラ」最弱同士の２人（匹）には魔物がはびこる異世界は過酷……と思いきや＿＿？

title.en: Jinsei ni Tsukareta Saikyou Majutsushi wa Akiramete Nemuru Koto ni Shita

altTitles.ja: 人生に疲れた最強魔術師は諦めて眠ることにした

altTitles.en: Tired of Life, the Strongest Magician Gave up and Fell Asleep

description.en:
Fiona, the most powerful magician in the empire, was tired of being overworked on the battlefield every day, both physically and emotionally. She thought she had given up her life on the battlefield, but when she woke up, she found herself under the protection of Matthias, the most powerful knight in the enemy kingdom!

In this powerful and loving fantasy, Fiona recovers her life while receiving love and tenderness for the first time!

---
**Original Web Publication:** [Comic Pixiv](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/9722), [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_FL00204275010000_68/), [NicoVideo](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/64890)

**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16817330652446237885), [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1027hw/)

altTitles.ja: ガラクシアス

description.en:
It's been ten years since the assassination of the Dragon King, the land's most powerful ruler. Off in the corner of the kingdom where tailed dragonfolk dwell, Jio, a human girl, yearns for adventure and an escape from rural life. However, when she meets the mysterious, amnesiac young man Neraid, Jio's life turns upside-down! With courage and curiosity knocking on the door, the two of them find the ultimate adventure waiting for them!! A traditional battle fantasy from a rookie artist begins!! (K MANGA)
___
[Official X Account](https://x.com/GALAXIAS_manga)
**Official English:** [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10608/episode/352898) - United States, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, & Singapore only.
Pairing: Todoroki Shouto x Bakugou Katsuki

altTitles.ja: サザエさん
よりぬきサザエさん

description.en: Slice of life manga about a woman named Sazae and her family.

altTitles.pl: Moja nowa dziewczyna nie jest człowiekiem?

altTitles.ja: がんばっていきまっしょい

description.en: “Chimeras” are people that have been infused with animal DNA in order to give them superpowers and abilities, however society doesn’t favor them so they live in fear and rejection. Our main character, code name “01”, works as a mercenary who happens upon an old acquaintance. He’s then given a job to protect and transport Enoch, a girl who is sought out to be the perfect “material”, to the borders of Canada.
description.fr: Les "chimères" sont des personnes auxquelles on a infusé de l'ADN animal afin de leur donner des superpouvoirs et des capacités, mais la société ne les favorise pas, si bien qu'elles vivent dans la peur et le rejet. Notre personnage principal, dont le nom de code est "01", travaille comme un mercenaire qui tombe sur une vieille connaissance. Il est ensuite chargé de protéger et de transporter Enoch, une fille qui est recherchée pour être le "matériel" parfait, jusqu'aux frontières du Canada.
description.pt: “Quimeras” são pessoas que foram infundidas com DNA animal para receber superpoderes e habilidades, mas a sociedade os despreza e vivem marginalizados. Nosso protagonista, codinome “01”, trabalha como um mercenário e recebe a missão de proteger e levar Enoch, o “material” perfeito, à fronteira do Canadá.

altTitles.ja: ミュエラの捜査官

altTitles.th: นักสืบแห่งมิวเอลล่า

description.en:
Kate Smith enjoys her quiet life as a maid and has no interest in getting married. Her resolve only deepens as she watches her peers swoon over the moody manservant, Ian. Whether it's fate or bad luck, Kate quickly finds herself in a series of compromising encounters with him. One day another maid goes missing and the mystical happenings that follow only intensify her suspicions about Ian. As the expert detective Jade Killian comes into town, can he help her uncover the truth?

---
Kate is a maid at the Baron's estate in Muiella, a country where warlocks and witches are shunned. One day, the new servant Ian arrives… but he's much too proper and handsome for his lowly rank. As they keep running into each other, Kate's suspicion of Ian's disarming demeanor only grows when strange incidents crop up in the manor. Sleuthing for the truth, the wellbeing of the estate and its residents may be at stake! Where's a good detective when you need one?!

---
[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home/50099907)

**Official Translation:**
* English: [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-detective-of-muiella/info), [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/series/detmuiella/) (expired)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [French / Français](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/lenqueteur-de-muiella)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Detective-of-Muiella/210)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/18201)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B7%E0%B8%9A%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A7%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2/34)
description.fr:
Simple deomestique dans un manoir à la campagne, elle ne pensait pas se retrouver mêlée à un mystère. Alors qu’elle ne désire qu’avoir une petite vie tranquille, la visite d’un enquêteur au manoir et l’arrivée d’un valet mystérieux vont bouleverser son petit quotidien. La disparition d’une de ses amies va la pousser à enquêter sur les mystères entourant le manoir...

---
Kate est une domestique dans un manoir à Muiella, une contrée où les gens dotés de pouvoirs magiques sont rejetés. Un jour, Ian, un nouveau domestique arrive… Mais il est bien trop impeccable et élégant pour un simple servant.

Les soupçons de Kate quant au comportement désarmant de Ian ne font que grandir à mesure que d’étranges incidents se produisent dans le manoir.

La recherche de la vérité pourrait bien mettre tous les résidents en danger! Où trouver un bon détective quand on en a besoin?!

---
[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home/50099907)

**Official Translation:**
* English: [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-detective-of-muiella/info), [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/series/detmuiella/) (expired)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)

* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Detective-of-Muiella/210)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/18201)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B7%E0%B8%9A%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A7%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2/34)
description.ko:
마법사와 마녀를 배척하는 나라. 뮈엘라.
뮈엘라의 시골 영지 알라나데일의 저택에서 하녀로 일하는 케이트.

어느 날, 그녀가 일하는 데일 남작가에 수상한 하인이 들어온다.

하인에 어울리지 않는 훤칠한 키에 단정한 외모를 가진 그는 첫날부터 주목을 받지만,
케이트는 사사건건 자신과 부딪치는 이안이 마음에 들지 않는다.

한편 그녀가 몸담은 데일 남작가에 불길한 사건들이 하나둘 일어나기 시작하는데…….

---
[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home/50099907)

**Official Translation:**
* English: [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-detective-of-muiella/info), [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/series/detmuiella/) (expired)

description.uk:
Муелла - країна, яка неприймає чарівників та відьом. Кейт працює покоївкою в сільській місцевості в маєтку Аланалейл. Одного разу в маєток влаштовується підозрілий слуга. Він недостатньо вмілий для слуги, і в нього гарна зовнішність. Тим часом у будинку барона починають відбуватися зловісні події.

---

description.en: Sheryl lives in a city full of dangers that most people do not notice.

title.en: Multiverse no Watashi, Koishite Ii desu ka?

altTitles.ja: マルチバースの私、恋していいですか?

altTitles.en: Is It Alright for My Multiverse Self to Fall in Love?

altTitles.vi: Em của đa vũ trụ có thể yêu anh được không?

altTitles.ja: マル恋

description.en:
Jogo has a crush on his classmate, Miyato. 

One day, they unexpectedly end up walking home together after school. When Miyato is about to be hit by a truck, Jogo throws himself in harm's way to save her. In the final moment before impact, Jogo wishes he could have told Miyato how he felt. 

But then he hears a mysterious voice saying, "You can do it over. This time, don’t have any regrets."

When he wakes up, he finds himself unharmed, lying on the ground, with a different version of Miyato beside him — she looks the same, but her clothes and hairstyle are different...?
description.ja:
本当なら出逢えていなかった、私とあなた。好きだと言わなくても後悔はしない？

可能性を切り拓く、マルチバースラブコメ読切！

description.en:
"I was a Queen from the Joseon Dynasty who was murdered by the royal consort?!"

Kim Minju, who suddenly remembered her past life while taking an exam. 

She was very confused when she remembered but tried to calm down because the most important thing was her college entrance examination and not her previous 
life. But the Consort, who was her enemy in the past life came to find Minju. 
And soon after, even the King who was her husband in the past life appears in front of her and puts her student life into a crisis. 

"I don't care about the past life or whatever, just please let me study!"
description.ko:
'내가 후궁에게 살해당한 조선의 왕비?!'
시험을 보다가 갑자기 전생을 떠올리게 된 민주.
크게 당황하지만, 전생보다 중요한 것은 대입이었기에 애써 마음을 추스른다.
하지만 전생의 철천지 원수였던 후궁이 민주를 찾아오고
뒤이어 전생에 남편이었던 왕까지 나타나면서 민주의 수험생활은 위기를 맞는데....
'전생이고 나발이고 제발 공부 좀 하자!!'

description.vi:
“Tôi muốn cậu trở thành nguồn cảm hứng của tôi!”

Hai con người với những đam mê cháy bỏng nhưng lạc lối trong chính câu chuyện của riêng mình. Một cách tình cờ, họ đã gặp được nhau.

Ở cạnh nhau, Yuji và Masa, hai con người yêu cái đẹp, được sống là chính mình. Cùng niềm đam mê quá đỗi đặc biệt họ dần khám phá ra những cảm xúc chôn giấu và điều sẽ thay đổi cuộc đời của họ mãi mãi.

altTitles.ja: 写らナイんです
The ghost doesn't show up.

description.en: A high school boy who sees things that shouldn't be there encounters an enthusiastic girl from the occult research club. (Manga Mogura)

altTitles.ja: 救済系Vッタラー✟メシアちゃん

description.en: A horror manga where viewers watch and join in on Messiah-chan's stream activities.

title.en: Mitsuishi-san is Being Weird This Year

altTitles.ja: 今年の三石さんはどこかおかしい

altTitles.ja-ro: Kotoshi no Mitsuishi-san wa Dokoka Okashil
Kotoshi no Mitsuishi-san ha Dokoka Okashii
Kotoshi no Mitsuishi-san wa Doko ka Okashii

altTitles.en: There's Something Strange About Mitsuishi-san This Year

altTitles.zh-hk: 今年的三石同學哪裡有點怪

altTitles.vi: Mitsuishi-san năm nay cứ là lạ

altTitles.ja: 三石さん

description.en:
A notebook? A jersey!? Gym clothes!?!? What do you want to borrow?

Mitsuishi constantly takes care of her classmate Hajime, a lethargic boy. What made the cool honor student Mitsuishi suddenly change over the past year?

altTitles.ja: 異世界のんびり農家

altTitles.fr: La vie de fermier dans un autre monde

altTitles.pt-br: A Vida Agrícola em Outro Mundo

altTitles.vi: Cuộc Sống Nông Dân Ở Thế Giới Khác

description.en: Having died of sickness at the age of 39, Machio Hiraku is given the opportunity to go to another world. When asked what his wish is by God intending to give him strength, he requests to have a healthy body, offered a second wish, he chooses to live peacefully, a third wish to be able to know the local language, and for a final wish, to be able to be a farmer.
description.ja:
闘病の末に命を落とした青年・火楽は、神様によって蘇生され、若返って異世界に転移した。第二の人生を楽しむため、授けられた『万能農具』を手に、異世界で掘って伐って耕して…。

**Links:**  

- [![](https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png) Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3289ds/)
- [Official LN (JP)](http://www.fujimishobo.co.jp/sp/201803nonbiri/)
- [Alternative Raw](https://dragonage-comic.com/product/nonbiri_noka/)
description.tr: Henüz 39 yaşındayken hastalıktan ölen Machio Hiraku'ya başka bir dünyaya gitme fırsatı verilir. Kendisine güç vermek isteyen Tanrı tarafından dileği sorulduğunda sağlıklı bir bedene sahip olmayı, ikinci bir dilek olarak huzur içinde yaşamayı, üçüncü bir dilek olarak yerel dili bilmeyi ve son bir dilek olarak da çiftçi olabilmeyi seçer.

altTitles.ja: 殺しと噓のマリアージュ

description.en: From the fearsome tag team of Kawamoto Homura (Kakegurui) and Nadai Nishi (Satsudou) comes the cutest serial killer heroine ever?! A romantic thriller where exposing the lie means instant death!

title.en: Tsurenai Hodo Aokute Azatoi Kurai ni Akai

altTitles.ja: つれないほど青くて あざといくらいに赤い

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsurenai Hodo Aokute Azatoi Kurai ni Akai

altTitles.es-la: Tan frío como el azul y tan agresivo como el rojo

altTitles.vi: Xanh đến nỗi Lạnh Lùng, Đỏ tới mức Xảo Quyệt

description.en: Is this senior... female? Male? Neutral? Demonic? A transfer student suffering from an incurable disease called curiosity meets a mysterious being (human) who is beautiful, cute, cool, and terrifying. The first of a new generation of horror comic authors presents an abyssal love story, a ghost story to peek into and sensuality to you.
description.ja: 覗いてはいけない、だから、覗きたい。　この先輩は…女性？　男性？　中性？　魔性??　好奇心という不治の病を患う転校生が出会ったのは、美しく、可愛らしく、格好よく、恐ろしい、謎の存在（ヒト）だった。
description.ru:
Мой сэмпай... Кто же это? Девушка? Парень? Оно? Демон?.. Главный герой — переведенный ученик старшей школы, страдающий неизлечимым чувством любопытства натыкается на красивое, милое, крутое и опасное создание (человека?). С этого момента и начинаются их необычные отношения.

(Source: mangalib)
description.vi: Liệu senpai này là... Nữ giới? Nam giới? Vô giới? Ác quỷ giới?? Một học sinh chuyển trường mắc một căn bệnh vô phương cứu chữa gọi là sự hiếu kì đã gặp phải một tồn tại bí ẩn dưới hình dạng của một con người vô cùng xinh đẹp và dễ thương nhưng cũng rất lạnh lùng và đáng sợ. Một câu chuyện tình yêu nơi vực thẳm, một câu chuyện ma quái đầy gợi cảm, mang đến cho bạn bởi tác giả đứng đầu về một thế hệ mới của truyện kinh dị...!

altTitles.ja: 和歌ちゃんは今日もあざとい

altTitles.en: A Hidden Side to my Crush

altTitles.pt-br: O lado oculto da minha Crush

description.en: Tomoya is a college freshman on a mission to finally get his first ever girlfriend, but with one small problem: he's still a virgin! While he's gotten close with the beautiful and charming girl Waka Sakuraba in his club at school, he can't wrack up the courage to take the first step and ask her out. One day, Tomoya stumbles upon a hidden side to his crush Waka...
description.ja:
彼女を作ろうと意気込むDT（童貞）な大学１年生・友哉。同じサークルの癒やし系美少女・桜庭和歌と親しくなるものの、勇気が出ずなかなか第一歩を踏み出せずにいた。
そんなある日、友哉は和歌の「別の一面」を目撃してしまい…？

title.en: Tonari no Seki no Yatsu ga Souiu Me de Mitekuru

altTitles.ja: となりの席のヤツがそういう目で見てくる

altTitles.es-la: La persona sentada a mi lado me mira de esa manera
La persona de al lado me mira con esos ojos

altTitles.uk: Однокласниця що сидить біля мене, дивиться на мене хтивими очима

altTitles.en: The weirdo one desk over keeps giving me THAT kind of look

altTitles.ur: Sath ki kursi par beithne wali mujhe "Un Ankhoñ" se deikhti he

description.en:
While you were admiring the girl in the next seat, she might be eyeing you up, too…? A new kind of “neighborly” short-form pure love comedy!

(Source: Sunday Webry, translated)
description.ja: 主人公の池沢くんは、同じクラスの美少女・江口さんのことを「そういう目」で見ている。しかし実は、江口さんも「そういう目」で池沢くんのことを見ていて！？チラ見えする筋肉、汗ばむ肌、髪の香り…互いに興味津々な2人の「下心」から始まる純愛ラブコメ！好きな人のなら、臭いも汗も×××も…全部好き。

altTitles.ja: ボクラノキセキ

description.en: From a young age, Minami Harusumi has had recurring dreams of Veronica, a princess whose kingdom is on the verge of destruction. He believes them to be recollections of his past life, and that he is her reincarnation. Because of this, he is ridiculed by his classmates. One day, when the mockery escalates into bullying, he rediscovers magic—something Veronica had studied and used. Reassured his past life is not merely a fantasy, Minami tries to learn more about his past memories and the reason behind them…

altTitles.ja: 図書館の大魔術師

altTitles.en: The Great Wizard of the Library

description.en:
In a distant world reminiscent of Arabian Nights, a mysterious young elf-child etched by a difficult life in the slums of a remote village with his elder sister.  
One day, he encountered Sedona, a librarian from the greatest library of the land, and the two formed a bond as they began their adventure in a fantastic and wondrous world.  
  


---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Ki-oon](http://www.ki-oon.com/mangas/minisite-697-magus-of-the-library-l-histoire.html)

altTitles.en: Guns Girl Z EX - Sakura Arc

description.en:
Houkai Gakuen EX is a special comic introduced in version 2.3 of miHoYo's online game, [Houkai Gakuen 2](https://www.benghuai.com/). [The story also comes with her own MAD version.](https://www.bilibili.com/video/av2645577)  
The story set in Middle age, when black death known as honkai pandemic haunt entire europe. The Schicksal using honkai box to purify outbreak causing the victim turned into honkai beast. Kallen Kaslana decided to steal honkai box and destroyed it but instead she got shot by bullet and stranded upon in land of yamato(known as Japan) in Yae village. After that she was saved by guardian miko in that village named Sakura. This is fateful story between two girls.  
  
(Houkai Gakuen 2 timeline: version 2.3 as World Boss and 4.0 as Limited time Coop Mode)  
(Honkai Impact 3 estimated timeline : Direct Sequel of #Book 1009 and Half Century before #Book 1001)  


---

Main Story :   
[# Book 1001 = Escape From The Sky](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)   
[# Book 1002 = Cherry Blossom Recall](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)   
[# Book 1003 = Mystery of Stigmata](https://mangadex.org/manga/26804/honkai-impact-3rd-mystery-of-stigmata)

[# Book 1008 = Moon Shadow](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)    


---

[# Book 1014 = Summer Memories](https://mangadex.org/title/30931/honkai-impact-3rd-summer-memories)

title.en: Dungeon Tou de Yadoya wo Yarou! Souzou Mahou wo Moratta Ore no Hosoude Hanjouki

altTitles.ja: ダンジョン島で宿屋をやろう! 創造魔法を貰った俺の細腕繁盛記

altTitles.en: Let's run an inn on Dungeon Island! A Story of my Weak Selfs Success after receiving Creation Magic

altTitles.zh-hk: 在迷宮島上經營旅館吧！得到創造魔法之後我的成長記

altTitles.ja-ro: Dungeon Shima de Yadoya o Yarou! Sōzō Mahō o Moratta Ore no Hosoude Hanjō-ki

altTitles.zh: 在迷宫岛上经营旅馆吧！得到创造魔法之后我的成长记

altTitles.ko: 던전 섬에서 여관을 하자! 창조 마법을 받은 나의 가냘픈 번성기

description.en:
One day, Sanada Shirou, who works for a black company, is transported to another world. Using his "creation magic", an ability he gained when transported, he opens an inn and is supposed to lead a slow life, but this other world is a little strange?! It is a world where women are overwhelmingly dominant, where women do dangerous work and battle, and men are powerless and are protected! The daily life of entertaining (in many ways) the women of this other world begins...!

---
**Links:**
- [Web Novel](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/1177354055503576578)  (JP)

title.en: Otonari-kun wa Kyou mo Watashi wo Komaraseru

altTitles.ja: おとなりくんは今日もわたしを困らせる

altTitles.ja-ro: Otonarikun ha kyou mowatashi wo komaraseru

description.ja:
心配性な女子高生のミオンは入学早々、デカくて怖いホーイチの隣の席になってしまう。おびえる日々を過ごすミオンだけど、だんだんホーイチは怖くはないと気がついて…。
むしろドキドキさせてきて、困るのですが！？

心配性女子×ノーテンキ男子の噛み合わないけど愛おしいドタバタラブコメ開幕♡

title.en: Gyaru ni Koisuru 5 Byou Mae Anthology Comic

altTitles.ja: ギャルに恋する５秒前 アンソロジーコミック

altTitles.ja-ro: Gyaru ni Koisuru Go Byou Mae Anthology Comic

altTitles.en: 5 Seconds Before Falling in Love with a Gyaru - Anthology Comics

description.en:
"You’re bound to fall in love when a gal is kind to you!". Despite dressing flamboyantly with a smidgin of lewdness sprinkle in, these gals occasionally show a pure side that will leave you mesmerized and-?

This is an Anthology collection of 6 chapters:
-Don’t seduce me, Sakihara-san! (by Kazawa Youhei)
-Kiyokawa-san is definitely a gyaru! (by saku)
-The gyaru childhood friend wants to give a warm welcome! (by Urano Ritsu)
-The gyaru likes ramen! (by Hidari Ude)
-Munching ♡ Kanna-chan ~A recipe for making gyaru fall in love with you~ (by Noki Kuzuri)
-The inexperienced gyaru asks for her teacher’s lessons (by Kamon Shoumi)

Cover illustration: Kazawa Youhei

Because of her personality, highschooler Xu Ting is often picked on by her classmates. Until one day, the school’s young, new maintenance worker saves her.  His attractive looks and mysterious aura enthrall the bullies.  Xu Ting feels indebted, yet in the small forest after school, she accidentally discovers his deepest secret?!

altTitles.ja: 異世界サムライ

description.en:
The strongest swordsman of the Warring States period, transferred to another world.

At the end of the Warring States Period, Ginko, the greatest swordsman of the time, was always hungry for a fight to the death with someone stronger than herself. After cutting and cutting and cutting, she finally despairs that there is no one stronger than her in this world, and then she is transferred to another world! Before her eyes - a dragon!
description.ja:
戦国時代最強の剣豪、異世界転移。

戦国時代末期、最強の剣豪・ギンコは常に、自分より強いものとの死闘に飢えていた。切って切って切りまくり、ついにこの世に自分以上の強者がいないと絶望した矢先、異世界へ転移！　目の前には――ドラゴン！？
description.pt-br:
A espadachim mais forte do período dos Reinos Combatentes, transferida para outro mundo.

No final do Período dos Reinos Combatentes, Ginko, a maior espadachim da época, estava sempre ansiosa por lutar até a morte com alguém mais forte que ela. Depois de cortar e cortar e cortar, ela finalmente se desespera porque não há ninguém mais forte do que ela neste mundo, e então ela é transferida para outro mundo! Diante de seus olhos está um dragão!

description.en:
Nobody on the continent hasn't heard of the evil deeds of the great outlaw M. Godspeed.
But one day, a young man claiming to be the criminal's son suddenly appears trekking through the harsh desert.
This Jim Godspeed says he's killed his father and has the corpse to prove it!
A steampunk western from the mind of the master, Boichi!

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.es:
M. Godspeed fue un legendario villano cuya crueldad extrema hizo que su nombre resonara por todo el continente.
Un día, apareció un joven llamado Jim Godspeed, quien afirmó ser su hijo.
Jim dijo haber matado a su padre con sus propias manos y haber cruzado el desierto ¡con su cadáver a cuestas...!
¡Disfruta de esta épica historia ambientada en el Oeste de mano del aclamado maestro Boichi!

(Fuente: MangaPlus)
description.ja:
<毎週金曜更新>悪逆の限りを尽くし、大陸に名を轟かせた、偉大なる悪党M・ゴッドスピード。
ある日、彼の息子を名乗る、ジム・ゴッドスピードが現れた。
ジムは自らの手で父を殺し、その亡骸とともに、砂漠を渡ってきたと語る...！
巨匠・Boichiが紡ぐ、新たなるウエスタンストーリー！
description.vi:
Không ai trên khắp vùng đất này là chưa từng nghe đến những hành động tàn ác của tên tội phạm khét tiếng M. Godspeed.

Nhưng một ngày nọ, một chàng trai trẻ tuổi tự xưng là con trai của tên tội phạm đột nhiên xuất hiện, lặn lội qua vùng sa mạc khắc nghiệt.

Jim Godspeed này nói rằng hắn đã giết cha mình và có xác chết để chứng minh điều đó!

Một câu chuyện miền viễn tây theo phong cách steampunk đến từ Boichi!

altTitles.ja: SOUL CATCHER(S) -ソウルキャッチャーズ-

altTitles.th: โซล แคชเชอร์ส

description.en: Kamine Shouta is a boy who is able to "see" people's hearts, though the ability has caused him to distance himself from people. His meeting with saxophone player Tokisaka Hibiki changes both of them for the better, and Tokisaka convinces Kamine to join the school concert band. Now Kamine, who knows nothing about music, will have to use his ability to win over the band's section leaders in the hopes of leading the band to the national competition next year… as its conductor!

title.en: 1-Nen Inai ni Ojousama o Kouryaku Suru Maid no Ohanashi

altTitles.ja: 1年以内にお嬢様を攻略するメイドのお話

altTitles.ja-ro: Ichinen Inai ni Ojou-sama o Kouryaku Suru Maid no Ohanashi

altTitles.en: A Story About A Maid Conquering A Young Lady Within A Year
Precarious Female Executive Miss Black General
Precarious Woman Executive Miss Black General

altTitles.ja: 残念女幹部ブラックジェネラルさん

altTitles.es-la: La Precaria Mujer Ejecutiva Señorita General Black

description.en: Braveman is your average superhero. Unfortunately for him, his arch-nemesis also happens to be a stalker and his number one fan. Follow their story as Braveman struggles to overcome his greatest adversary and retain his peace of mind.
description.es-la: La General Black es la líder de una organización secreta que quiere dominar al mundo. Por desgracia también esta loca por Braveman un superhéroe dedicado a frustrar los malvados planes de esta organización. Entonces, ¿Cómo exactamente va a conquistar el mundo cuando ni siquiera puede conquistar sus propios sentimientos? ¿Y cómo va a responder Braveman a este extraño giro?
description.pt-br: Braveman é um super herói como qualquer outro. Infelizmente pra ele, sua arqui-inimiga é sua stalker e sua fã número 1. Acompanhe as aventuras de Braveman e sua luta incansável contra seu maior adversário enquanto tenta não perder a cabeça.

altTitles.ja: マオ

altTitles.th: หาญสู้พลิกชะตาอาถรรพณ์

description.en:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/mao)
- Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)

altTitles.ja: 犬がヒトになる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Inu ga Hito ni Naru Hanashi

altTitles.zh-hk: 我家碰太變成了人類這件事

altTitles.ja: ポン太がヒトになりまして。

altTitles.vi: Ponta nhà tôi bỗng dưng hóa thành người?!

description.en:
A slapstick comedy that involves a town and its neighbors where “pet dogs” have become “humans”!
Feelings that couldn’t be conveyed as a dog can now be understood directly…!?
description.fr: Un jour, les chiens de cette ville sont soudainement devenus humains. L'histoire suit la vie de Saki et de son chien Ponta.
description.ru: В один прекрасный день домашние собаки в этом городе вдруг превращаются в людей. История рассказывает о жизни хозяйки Саки и ее собаки Понты.
description.uk: Одного разу всі собаки, які жили в цьому місті раптово перетворилися на людей. Історія розповідає про життя Сакі, власниці, та Понти, її пса.
description.vi: Một ngày đẹp trời bỗng dưng toàn bộ chó trong một thị trấn nọ hóa thành người...Và cô nàng Saki phải sống(vật lộn) với một bé Husky hóa thành trai đẹp XD

title.en: Motokano Sensei wa, Choppiri Ecchi na Katei Houmon de Kimi to no Ai wo Hagukumitai.

altTitles.ja: 元カノ先生は、ちょっぴりエッチな家庭訪問できみとの愛を育みたい。

altTitles.en: Ex-girlfriend Teachers Want to Nurture Love by Making Slightly Naughty Visits to Your Home

altTitles.ja-ro: Moto Kano-sensei wa, Choppiri Ecchi na Katei Houmon de Kimi to no Ai wo Haguku Mitai.

description.en:
The new teachers at high school student Touma Nijino's school are his ex-girlfriends who dumped him in the past! Moreover, both Akari Akamine and  Kohaku Shirasawa are still in love with him. He is happy to see them again, but.... But he is not happy to see them again...
"Hey, can I kiss you?"
"Do you hate sleeping with me?"
They start competing with each other at the same time, trying to make a fait accompli with Touma before graduation. Moreover, they live in the same apartment complex as Touma and are trying to secretly nurture their love as a "commuter wife"...?
This is a sweet love comedy with ex-girlfriend teachers who tempt you with everything they've got!
description.ja: 高校生・虹野透真の学校に新任教師としてやって来たのは、かつて彼を振った元カノたちだった！　しかもその教師、赤峰朱里と白沢琥珀の二人はどっちも透真に未練がありまくり。思いがけない再会に喜ぶ透真だったが……。「ねえ、チューしていい？」「私との添い寝、嫌いになったの？」卒業までに透真と既成事実を作ってしまおうと、ふたり同時に抜け駆けスタート。しかも透真と同じマンションに住み、「通い妻」としてこっそり愛を育もうとしてきて――!?　全力で誘惑してくる元カノ教師との、甘々ラブコメディ！！
description.es-la: Las nuevas profesoras del estudiante Touma Nijino son sus ex novias que le dejaron en el pasado. Además, tanto Akamine Shuri como Shirasawa Kohaku siguen enamoradas de él. Se alegra de volver a verlas, pero.... No se alegra de volver a verlas... "Oye, ¿puedo besarte?" "¿Odias acostarte conmigo?" Empiezan a competir entre ellas al mismo tiempo, tratando de concretar un hecho ya establecido con Tohru antes de la graduación. Además, viven en el mismo complejo de apartamentos que Tohru e intentan alimentar su amor en secreto como una "esposa viajera"...? ¡Esta es una dulce comedia de amor con ex-novias profesoras que te tientan con todo lo que tienen!

title.en: Ookami wa Tsuki ni Koi wo Suru

altTitles.ja: オオカミは月に恋をする

altTitles.en: Wolf Falls in Love with Moon

altTitles.vi: Nàng Sói Trót Phải Lòng Với Mặt Trăng

description.en:
I'm the only one who knows my senpai's face. Senpai, who was supposed to hate me, ended up saying "I like you" to me...

The perfect but slightly scary Student Council President, "Wolf-senpai" aka Ookamigawa Rina, and the frivolous and clumsy Vice-President, Tsukiyama Yuuga. These two are complete opposites of each other, save for the fact that both of them have a secret face. One day, at his secret part-time job, he discovers Wolf-senpai's secret face...?
description.ja:
俺だけが知ってる、先輩の顔。俺のことが嫌いなはずの先輩に「好き」と言われてしまった───。

完璧だけどちょっぴり怖い生徒会長、『オオカミ先輩』こと狼川琉奈。そして、チャラくてポンコツな副会長・月山雄牙。二人はなにもかも正反対。ーーーひとつ、お互いに秘密の顔があることを除いて。ある時、月山は秘密にしているアルバイトを通じて、オオカミ先輩の裏の顔を知ることになり…!?

description.en: A true story about the creation of the camera.
Short manga posted by Imo Ichirou [@cheesesama24] on Twitter.

altTitles.en: I Thought It's a Common Isekai Story
I Thought It Was a Common Possession

altTitles.fr: Not So Bad to Be Bad!

description.en: I was the villainess who would die at the hands of the male lead, but I know this is a cliché! I thought it was a pretty good deal to die unjustly, as a payment for the price I paid for being the villainess. Until I realized that I couldn’t escape from the original plotline. If I was going to die anyway according to the original, then let’s give a kiss to my handsome husband!… Why did the original plot start to change?
description.ko:
그럼 그렇지, 내 팔자에 무슨 주인공이야.

남편 손에 죽을 팔자의 악녀였지만, 난 이 클리셰를 안다!​
억울하게 죽은 대가로는 꽤 괜찮다고 생각했다.
원작의 흐름에서 벗어나지 못한다는 걸 깨닫기 전까지는.
결국 원작대로 죽을 거라면, 초미남 남편에게 뽀뽀라도 해보자!

altTitles.ja: 高音さんと嵐ちゃん
ヒモクズ花くんは死にたがり

altTitles.en: Deadbeat Hana-kun Has a Death Wish

altTitles.zh-hk: 軟飯人渣小花想要去死

altTitles.zh: 软饭人渣小花想要去死

altTitles.vi: Hana-Kun Không Thể Sống Thiếu Tôi

description.en:
"I'll die with you, I promise."

Yoshino is a second-year working adult who is exhausted from her daily life and work. One of the worst days of her life, Yoshino gets drunk and wakes up the next morning to find a mysterious boy named Hana-kun sleeping next to her. Yoshino ends up living with Hana-kun for a limited time, and surprisingly begins to feel comfortable living with Hana-kun. Meanwhile, due to a certain incident, Hana-kun becomes obsessed with her for some reason... When a scummy man whose love is too heavy meets a deeply compassionate female office worker, a love resembling a potent drug begins!?
description.ja: 日々の生活と仕事に疲れ切っている社会人2年目の吉野（よしの）。人生最悪のある日泥酔した吉野が翌朝目覚めると、となりに寝ていたのは謎めいた男子「花くん」だった。 期間限定で一緒に暮らすことになり、意外にも花くんとの生活に居心地の良さを覚えていく吉野。そんな中、ある事件をきっかけに花くんになぜか執着されることになって… 愛の重いクズ男子×情の深い社畜女子、劇薬みたいな恋がはじまる⁉

altTitles.ja: 君めく夜に焦がれて

altTitles.en: Yearning for a Night Full of You

description.en: At Saint Ruri Girl's Academy, there are two opposing factions: the "Ruri Class," consisting of refined, well-bred ladies, and the "Ai Class," made up of delinquents with poor behavior. Nanase Mitsuki, among the students of the Ai Class, is the most feared by the Ruri Class due to her intimidating appearance, though Mitsuki harbors a complex about her looks. One night, she meets Hosho Yuka, a young lady wandering alone at night...
description.ja: ここには、由緒正しいお嬢様たちの「瑠璃組」と、素行のよくない不良たちの「藍組」という、相反する2つの勢力があった。七瀬珠月（ななせみつき）は、藍組生徒の中でも、その厳つい見た目から瑠璃組に最も恐れられる存在。そんな見た目にコンプレックスを抱えていた珠月だが、ある夜、夜道を徘徊するお嬢様・宝生悠花（ほうしょうゆうか）に出会い……？

altTitles.ja: アズールレーン４コママンガ　びそくぜんしんっ！

description.en: Official 4-koma webcomic from the popular mobile game Azur Lane.

Wouldn’t it be a dream to wake up in a world of your own creation? For Kim Hajin, it’s nothing short of a nightmare. 

With no clue how or why he’s been transported into his web novel — as a mere extra, no less! — Hajin has little choice but to see his story through until the end. Lucky for him, as the author, he knows this perilous world like the back of his hand. 

But when discrepancies in the plot begin popping up left and right, Hajin soon realizes that things aren’t quite so simple, after all…

---

**Links:**
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4mamlw_Z8eo)
description.ko:
"나는 누구지?"

이 세상은 내가 쓴 소설.
그러나 나는 단 한 번도 쓴 적 없는 인물이 되었다.

얼굴은 물음표에다,
소설 속 그 누구와도 접점이 없는,
아무도 기억 못할 그런 인물.

영웅 아카데미에 입학한 엑스트라, 아니 소설 속 먼지가 살아남는 법.

남은 소설 분량까지 버텨야 한다!

altTitles.ja: バレンタインの残念賞
